channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- FortiAnalyzer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- FortiAnalyzer

item.title: CVE-2023-40719|2024-08-30T18:08:00.074Z -- fortinet -- fortianalyzer
item.description: A use of hard-coded credentials vulnerability in Fortinet FortiAnalyzer and FortiManager 7.0.0 - 7.0.8, 7.2.0 - 7.2.3 and 7.4.0 allows an attacker to access Fortinet private testing data via the use of static credentials.
